name: Time Wars
description:
This is my first project on Unity. It's an imperfect 2.5D side-scroller that may look unprofessional to some with conflicting aesthetic.
The game's story is purely humorous as it's about robots invading historical events in order to assassinate historical characters that you play as.
Most things are copyrighted such as environments and sounds etc. so credits to whomever who notices their content is used as this game serves only as a demonstration of my attempt at game making with Unity.

Note: When I say imperfect I mean it's got bugs I kept just to laugh at and the Cleopatra level never ends so keep yourself entertained.

CONTROLS:

For Alexander and Columbus - Z to attack, X to Jump and Arrow keys to move

For Cleopatra: Up and Down arrow keys

Enjoy and thanks for playing. Give no critique unless it's positive. :)
